      • startNormalHandling

        public void startNormalHandling(IRfbSessionListener rfbSessionListener,
                                IRepaintController repaintController,
                                ClipboardController clipboardController)
        Following the server initialisation message it's up to the client to send whichever protocol messages it wants. Typically it will send a SetPixelFormat message and a SetEncodings message, followed by a FramebufferUpdateRequest. From then on the server will send FramebufferUpdate messages in response to the client's FramebufferUpdateRequest messages. The client should send FramebufferUpdateRequest messages with incremental set to true when it has finished processing one FramebufferUpdate and is ready to process another. With a fast client, the rate at which FramebufferUpdateRequests are sent should be regulated to avoid hogging the network.
